name: RANGE RUNNER
description:
RANGE RUNNER is a Multi-Skill, color scorecard based shooting game. 

Your mission, should you chose to accept it is to shoot down dynamic targets and speed run thru the course in parallel. 

Your overall gameplay performance will be awarded an Experience level /rank.

There are Experience level based color zones -  Purple Zone being the best and the most basic being the Red Zone. 

Along with a Pistol, you are also given a grabbing gun for clinging on to things and swinging in the air ( Pro gamers will eventually use this to complete the map faster)

Enjoy the Game and showcase your shooting skills to your peers.

Good luck !
